title: The Reason Why - citations from the rector

content.question: The citations from the rector of Hambleden's letters do all of the following EXCEPT

choices.label: document the speaker's sketch of the Brudenells
illustrate the rector's influence over the Brudenells
characterize the simplicity of life in Hambleden
provide evidence of the Brudenells' philanthropy

content.answer: illustrate the rector's influence over the Brudenells

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
